tasks.title: Evaluations
tasks.description: Select the tasks to run. For more information on the tasks, view [AISI Inspect Evals](https://inspect.aisi.org.uk/evals/).

limit.title: Sample limit
limit.description: Maximum number of samples to evaluate for each task. Leave blank or set to 0 to evaluate all samples.

artifact_path.title: Model artifact
artifact_path.description: Path to the model artifact to use for the evaluation job.

create_leaderboard.title: Leaderboard
create_leaderboard.label: Publish results to leaderboard
create_leaderboard.description: Evaluation results will be shown in a leaderboard. Once generated, leaderboards can be found in the Leaders page of your project.

hf_token.title: Hugging Face token
hf_token.description: (Optional) Personal access token used to read gated datasets from Hugging Face.

scorer_api_key.title: Scorer API key
scorer_api_key.description: (Optional) Some evals use an OpenAI model as the default scorer.
